author: sly_gryphon
content:
So, I am working on moving to spec 0.10.1, and noticed a few things; also noticed there are some further inconsistencies in the dev branch.

What is the best way to raise potential issues - just put up a pull request with changes, or raise an Issue in github, or just mention it here for a discussion?

author: sly_gryphon
content: Some issues/suggestions: (1) storage of SignedBeaconBlock, (2) recursive use of BeaconBlockHeader.StateRoot inside state isn't useful or necessary, (3) inconsistency in BeaconBlockHeader.StateRoot for skipped slots vs block slots, and (4) in the latest dev branch inconsistency between filter_block_tree and the changed definition of store.blocks.
